parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of selected entities for this reference axis feature

parameters.name: TypeArr
parameters.description: Array of the types of selected entities for this reference axis feature as defined by swSelectType_e

title: IRefAxisFeatureData.IGetSelections
description: Gets the selected entities for this reference axis feature.
signature:
System.Object IGetSelections( 
   System.Int32
Count
,
   out System.Int32
TypeArr
)

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of selected entities for this reference axis feature

parameters.name: TypeArr
parameters.description: Array of the types of selected entities for this reference axis feature as defined by swSelectType_e

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Array of the selected entities VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IRefAxisFeatureData::GetSelectionsCount
before calling this method to get the value for Count.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
